    • Method Detail

      • getStaticResourceRootPath

        String getStaticResourceRootPath()
        Returns:
        Path from app's root to static resource folder. Will be give to

      • addViewControllers

        void addViewControllers(org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.ViewControllerRegistry registry)
        This method is to let the @Configuration implementation with this interface have ability to add static cases of request mapping (what do not involve no controller logic).
        So that, this may help to concentrate view related configuration to the @Configuration implementation with this interface.
        In order to let the @Configuration implementation with this interface have the ability, such @Configuration implementation needs to be imported to sub-class of WebMvcConfigurationSupport, and this method must be called (directly or indirectly) at inside of overridden addViewControllers method of that sub-class.
        Parameters:
        registry -

      • getInternalResourcePrefix

        String getInternalResourcePrefix()
        Returns:
        Prefix string being given to UrlBasedViewResolver.setPrefix(String) method.

      • getInternalResourceSuffix

        String getInternalResourceSuffix()
        Returns:
        Suffix string being given to UrlBasedViewResolver.setSuffix(String) method.
